screening_score.reasoning: Amali Fernando has a moderate fit for the AI Engineer position. While she has 3 years of experience in software development and proficiency in Python, which is a required skill, she lacks experience in most of the required skills such as LangGraph, LangChain, OpenAI API, RAG Systems, Vector Databases, and LLM Applications. However, she has experience with FastAPI, which is a preferred skill, and has a strong background in web and backend application development. Her education background is also relevant, although a Master's degree is preferred.
strengths: Strong background in web and backend application development
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS
gaps: Lack of experience in LangGraph, LangChain, OpenAI API, RAG Systems, Vector Databases, and LLM Applications
Limited experience with Docker and MongoDB
No mention of experience with Multi-agent Systems or Prompt Engineering
Education level is a Bachelor's degree, whereas a Master's degree is preferred

email_template.subject: Update on Your Application for AI Engineer Position at Zelora Tech
email_template.body:
Dear Amali Fernando,

Thank you for your interest in the AI Engineer position at Zelora Tech. We appreciate the time you took to apply for this role and share your qualifications with us.

Although your background and skills are impressive, we regret to inform you that we will not be moving forward with your application at this time. Our team was looking for candidates with more experience in specific technologies such as LangGraph, LangChain, OpenAI API, RAG Systems, Vector Databases, and LLM Applications, as well as API development experience, which were not highlighted in your application.

Please know that this decision is not a reflection on your potential as a candidate, and we encourage you to continue developing your skills and consider applying for future opportunities at Zelora Tech.

Best regards,
The Zelora Tech Talent Team
hr@zeloratech.com
